sentences.cn: 空军的喷气式飞机轰炸了该机场。

sentences.en: As he talked, an airforce jet screamed over the town.
sentences.cn: 他谈话时，一架军用喷气式飞机在镇子上空呼啸而过。

sentences.en: Cheng Xiaojian, 46 an ace airforce pilot, has been appointed a military division level commander.
sentences.cn: 中国空军特级飞行员 、 46岁的程晓健,日前被任命为驻蓉运输航空兵某师师长.

sentences.en: His parents discouraged him from joining the airforce.
sentences.cn: 他的父母亲劝他不要参加空军.

sentences.en: I've recommended a preemptive Exocet Missile attack against his airforce.
sentences.cn: 我曾经提议过发起先发制人的飞鱼飞弹攻击他的空军.

sentences.en: Not just the airforce use aircraft.
sentences.cn: 不是只有空军使用飞机.

sentences.en: The airforce Air Force Academy is located at Colorado x Springs Colorado.
sentences.cn: 空军学院在科罗拉多的多泉市.

sentences.en: The armed forces of a country are army , navy and airforce.
sentences.cn: 在一星期国外访问的最后,到总统坐--空军一号总是很受欢迎的.

sentences.en: The army , navy and airforce are all controlled by the Ministry of Defence.
sentences.cn: 海陆空三军均由国防部管辖.

sentences.en: The army Army and airforce Air Force built the Redstone, Jupiter and Atlas rockets.
sentences.cn: 陆军和空军建设的雷石东, 木星和阿特拉斯火箭.

sentences.en: The army, navy and airforce are all controlled by the Ministry of Defense.
sentences.cn: 陆海空军皆由国防部控制.

sentences.en: The photographer, who took pictures of guests at the villa, said he had snaps of several people arriving aboard airforce planes.
sentences.cn: 拍摄到贝卢斯科尼客人照片的摄影记者称，他拍到数人乘空军飞机抵达。

sentences.en: The Royal Airforce sill remained dangerously short of bombers.
sentences.cn: 英国皇家空军仍未脱离极为缺乏轰炸机的危境.

sentences.en: The town has been heavily bombarded by the army backed by the airforce.
sentences.cn: 该镇遭到了有空军掩护的陆军部队的猛烈攻击。
